attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like gordon brown and his labour govenment to consider allowing the people of the Uk to have a free Month from Tax on there wages/salary
I think the way this could work would be to allow tax free allowance on anything earned under £25,000 per year 
If your a single man/women in this country and you work you do not get anything back from the state eg tax credits etc 
The system seems to be for the non working people if you work you get no benifits back for putting into the system
A month of not paying tax would be like getting a yearly bonus 
If you agree pass this petition around your work place and get has many people to sign
Its time the govenment gave us something back instead of just taking taking.....

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
